reviews.review_msg: Really nice person but lousy at giving feedback - she always tries to steer you in HER preferred direction according to her own personal biases, rather than really trying to understand what YOU (the student) are trying to accomplish.  A teacher should be able to inspire you to grow in your own way, not confine you to her approach only.

Elspeth is one of the best instuctors at SFU, and deserves far more recognition than what is given to her. Anyone so fortunate to take a course with her should really use her as an asset because she is a wealth of incredible insight and information.
